<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26

</row>

**HP** 100

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attacks, paralyzed, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) or orichalcum)

**Weaknesses**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 10, [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=276) 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mace multipistol_ +19 ([Critical Fusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=402), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dragon-mouth pistol +20 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [scatter 5 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=413)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_mace multipistol_ +21 ([capacity 3](/Traits.aspx?ID=273), [Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d4+3 piercing

**Integrated Weapons**   An integrated weapon is built into the limb of the clockwork gunner. They can't be disarmed, and they take 10 minutes to attach or remove. Each of a clockwork gunner's firearms can be loaded with 10 shots before they must be reloaded. Reloading a single round into either of these firearms takes 3 actions, or 10 minutes to fully reload a weapon. A clockwork gunner can't reload its own weapons.

</column>
